CustomField.formula: IF(Location.GDMFSL_Is_Classified__c = FALSE, "(" & LEFT(Contact.Phone , 3) & ") " & MID(Contact.Phone , 4, 3) & "-" & MID(Contact.Phone , 7,4) & " " & RIGHT(Contact.Phone , (LEN(Contact.Phone ) - 10)), "Undisclosed")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula based on the contact to obscure the phone for classified locations for service reports.
CustomField.label: Phone
